CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La residencia Grassley usó el tejado.

CONTENT: ダメなものはダメだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Rules are rules!

CONTENT: ケッ アーシアンだから 貸せねえってのかよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿No nos lo permite por ser Earthians o qué?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You won't give us permission because we're Earthians!

CONTENT: 困ったなー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What do we do now?

CONTENT: 義足の撮影は それなりに広くないと難しいし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Necesitamos un espacio grande para filmar las piernas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's hard to film prosthetic legs without a spacious-enough location.

CONTENT: あの... あ? どうした?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Excuse me... What is it?

CONTENT: 決闘委員会の ラウンジは どうでしょうか...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Y el salón del Comité de Duelos?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What if we use the Dueling Committee Lounge?
Huh?

CONTENT: そっか ホルダーなら...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait... if she's the Holder...

CONTENT: 使用権がある!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She has the right to use it!

CONTENT: なんだよ スレッタ マジ最高じゃーん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Great idea, Suletta! You're the best!

CONTENT: 水星女が来なければ⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: De no ser por esa mercuriana,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If the Mercurian wench hadn't come...

CONTENT: ホルダーはグエル先輩だったのに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Three cheers for Suletta! Mr. Guel would still be the Holder.

CONTENT: 仕方ないだろ 行くよ ペトラ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Así es la vida. Vámonos, Petra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta! Things happen. Let's go, Petra.

CONTENT: グエル先輩 まだ行方不明なんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is Mr. Guel still missing? Yay, Suletta!

CONTENT: どこに行ったんだ にいさんは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Where you have gone, Brother?

CONTENT: おい ボブ!　船底の清掃 まだできてねえのか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, Bob! Haven't you finished cleaning the underside yet?

CONTENT: すいません もう少しかかります
急げよ 出港は5日後だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Get a move on! Departure's in five days!

CONTENT: 出港?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Departure?

CONTENT: 搬入作業があるんだよ　お前も行くんだぞ プラント・クエタって⸺　ベネリットのデッケえ工場だっけか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tenemos algo que transportar. Tú también irás. La planta Quetta es del Benerit Group, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We have to carry in some cargo. You're going too! It's at Plant Quetta, some kind of big Benerit Group factory.

CONTENT: ベネリットの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Benerit?

CONTENT: なんかあんのか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That a problem?

CONTENT: いえ... 俺には⸺　関係ないところです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No. No tiene nada que ver conmigo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No... It's got nothing to do with me.

CONTENT: ガンダム ガンダム
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: GUND-ARM... GUND-ARM...

CONTENT: 希望の光
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A ray of hope

CONTENT: ガンダム...　ソフィー ん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: GUND-ARM... Sophie!

CONTENT: ノレア ねえ 見てよ　こいつ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Norea. Take a look at this.

CONTENT: アスティカシア　モビルスーツ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Asticassia... A mobile suit?

CONTENT: ガンダムだよ それ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That thing's a Gundam.

CONTENT: これが... 魔女?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is this... a witch?

CONTENT: 株式会社GUND-ARMだって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: \"GUND-ARM, Inc.\" they're calling it.

CONTENT: なめてるよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They're making a joke of it.

CONTENT: 飛べる 踊れる エアリアルー ハッ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: \"It can fly! It can dance! Aerial!\"

CONTENT: ソフィー ナジは?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sophie, where's Naji?

CONTENT: 畑じゃないの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In his garden, I'll bet.

CONTENT: ナジー アスティカシア学園から⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Naji! Call from the Asticassia School!

CONTENT: プリンスが直接話したいと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The Prince wants to talk directly.

CONTENT: 直接?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Directly?

CONTENT: 連絡役を通さないとは⸺　慎重な あんたらしくないな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Con lo precavido que eres, es raro que no uses a un mensajero.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Contacting me without the go-between? Where's your usual caution?

CONTENT: それだけ 重要な案件だと思ってください
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Considera que es un asunto importante.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That should tell you how vital this is.

CONTENT: で 要件は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What is it?

CONTENT: デリング・レンブランを⸺　襲撃してもらいたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We want you to attack Delling Rembran.

CONTENT: お前さんのところの トップを殺せってのか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're asking us to kill your head honcho?

CONTENT: 5日後⸺　デリングが プラント・クエタに入る予定です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En cinco días Delling irá a la planta Quetta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In five days... Delling will arrive at Plant Quetta.

CONTENT: 宇宙に上がってベネリット有数の 開発拠点を襲えとは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nos pides que vayamos al cielo a atacar la mejor base de Benerit.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Go into space and attack one of Benerit's greatest development bases...

CONTENT: アーシアンにキツすぎねえかい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Isn't that too hard a job for Earthians?

CONTENT: 拠点防衛の巡回艦隊は ジェターク社の管轄です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Jeturk les proporciona la flota defensiva.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The patrol fleet defending the base is under the Jeturk company's control.

CONTENT: 手薄にするよう話はついています
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Les dije que la dejen despejada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They've agreed to soften security.

CONTENT: そっちで 用意してもらいたいものがある
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I want you to prepare something for us first.

CONTENT: 航行ルートと その足もだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La nave y la ruta hasta allá.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The flight route and a ride for us.

CONTENT: そいつを確認してから 追って連絡しよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll be in touch once I've seen the details.

CONTENT: 手配ありがとう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks for setting this up.

CONTENT: お父さん役の人がよろしくって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tu padre designado te manda saludos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Your father figure says hello.

CONTENT: はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right...

CONTENT: なんで地球寮のやつらが⸺　ラウンジにいるわけ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué hacen aquí los de la residencia Tierra?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why are these dorks from Earth House in the lounge?

CONTENT: ねえ ロウジ? ロウジー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, Rouji! Rouji!

CONTENT: キレイだな これ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It sure is pretty.

CONTENT: パテント出願番号 AST...　あの 撮影中なんですけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Número de patente AST876754. -Este... Estamos filmando.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Patent application number AST876754... Excuse me, we're filming right now.

CONTENT: GUND医療の特徴の一つに...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: One strength of GUND treatment is that it can extract...

CONTENT: スゴいですよね ミオリネ先輩
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: ...the user's intentions from... Ms. Miorine is so cool!

CONTENT: インタビューにも出ちゃうなんて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: ...comprehensive biological data. She even does interviews!

CONTENT: はい ミオリネさんはスゴいです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks to this strength, we believe... Yeah, Ms. Miorine is amazing!

CONTENT: なーんか遠い人になっちまったな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: ...we can enable you to... She suddenly seems way beyond us.

CONTENT: 最初っから近くないだろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: ...physically adapt to... She was never really close.

CONTENT: ヘッ はいはい　向こうはサラブレットで こっちは雑草だよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí, sí. Ella es un pura raza y nosotros unos hierbajos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: ...the space environment. Yeah, yeah. She's a thoroughbred and we're weeds.

CONTENT: 食べられちゃいますね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So she's grazing on us?

CONTENT: まさしく!　俺たちは こき使われて みんな あいつの⸺　栄養になるんだー! アハハハハハ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pues sí. Nos explota para que le demos nutrientes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Exactly! She'll overwork us and consume us for her own nourishment!

CONTENT: 笑いごとじゃねえぞ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's nothing to laugh about.

CONTENT: え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: お前も遠くなる側だから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tú también te alejarás de ella.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She'll grow beyond you too.

CONTENT: そんなことないです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's not true!

CONTENT: うわっ 言うねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh! How do you know?!

CONTENT: 正妻の自信てやつだな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She has the confidence of a lawful wife!

CONTENT: 妻じゃないです 婿です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No soy su esposa. Soy el marido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not the wife! I'm the groom.

CONTENT: スレッター ん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta!

CONTENT: 本当は部外者の私が 手出しするべきじゃないんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En realidad no debería intervenir nadie de fuera,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: An outsider like me shouldn't be handling this,

CONTENT: ナナウラさんがいないから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but since Ms. Nanaura isn't here...

CONTENT: ベルメリアさん 何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Belmeria... Yes?

CONTENT: その... ありがとうございます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... Thank you very much.

CONTENT: ペイル社の人なのに 私たちのこと手伝ってくれて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eres de Peil, pero nos estás ayudando.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You work for Peil, and yet you've been helping us.

CONTENT: 私は 元々 医療工学を志していたの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Siempre quise trabajar en ingeniería médica.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I originally aspired to become a medical engineer.

CONTENT: だからね あなたたちの事業に 参加させてもらえるのは⸺　うれしいのよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por eso me alegro de poder participar en su empresa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I'm very happy to take part in your business efforts.

CONTENT: じゃあ Win-Winですね!　ウフ そうそう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's a win-win, then! That's right.

CONTENT: この前のグラスレーとの決闘...　あのとき...　あっ すいません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En el duelo contra Grassley... Perdón.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: About your recent duel with Grassley House... Back then, you- Excuse me!

CONTENT: 水温チェックの時間なんです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's time for the water temperature check.

CONTENT: あ... やることいっぱいで大変ね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It must be hard having so much to do.

CONTENT: いえ 全然! う...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No! Not at all!

CONTENT: いってきます!　いってらっしゃい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm off! Take care!

CONTENT: スレッタ・マーキュリー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta Mercury?

CONTENT: えっ エランさん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mr. Elan?

CONTENT: 久しぶりだね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Long time no see.

CONTENT: あの もう大丈夫なんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um, is it okay for you to be here?

CONTENT: うん　ペイル社の用事は すべて済んだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí. Terminé todos los encargos de Peil.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes. I've finished my errands for Peil.

CONTENT: 今日から復学
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll be returning to school from today.

CONTENT: よかったです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm glad to hear it!

CONTENT: 会社のPV見たよ　かわいく映ってた え...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vi el video promocional. Lucías muy hermosa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I saw your company's video. You looked very cute.

CONTENT: 本当だよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I mean it.

CONTENT: あ... あの エランさん...　なんか 変わりました?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: U-Um, Mr. Elan... Have you changed somehow?

CONTENT: 変わったよ　君が変えたんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have indeed. Thanks to you.

CONTENT: え... え... えーっと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, um...

CONTENT: 今度 デートしようよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why don't we go on a date?

CONTENT: デート!? 嫌?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A date?! You don't want to?

CONTENT: いえ その... そんなことないですけど...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, that's not... That's not it, but...

CONTENT: けど?　その...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But? I, uh...

CONTENT: ミオリネさんがいるから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What about Ms. Miorine?

CONTENT: あー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see.

CONTENT: でも それって ウソなんでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo sé. Pero eso es falso, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But that's all a lie, isn't it?

CONTENT: みんな ウワサしてるよ　君は結婚したくないミオリネの 弾よけだって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Dicen que eres el escudo de Miorine, que en realidad no quiere casarse.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Everyone's gossiping about it. You're being used as a shield so Miorine can avoid getting married.

CONTENT: 名目上は結婚という形を 取るかもしれない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You two may end up married in name,

CONTENT: けど そこに心はないさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero será una unión sin corazón.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but her heart won't be in it.

CONTENT: だから きっと⸺　許してくれるよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por eso estoy seguro de que te lo perdonará.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I'm sure... she'll forgive you.

CONTENT: ご... ごめんなさい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I'm really sorry!

CONTENT: 逃げられちゃったか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She ran away, huh?

CONTENT: でも まあ 押せば落ちるな　あれは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Still, a little push is all it will take... to win her over.

CONTENT: 我々が欲しいのは⸺　あのエアリアルというモビルスーツ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Queremos el Mobile Suit llamado Aerial.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: All we want is that Aerial mobile suit.

CONTENT: ジェタークや グラスレーのように⸺　堂々と勝負する必要はありませんわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No es necesario plantear enfrentamientos directos como Jeturk o Grassley.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We've no need to challenge it in the open like Grassley or Jeturk.

CONTENT: 今度の新しい強化人士　決め手はなんだったのさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That new enhanced person... why did you choose him?

CONTENT: あなたと同じ性格の悪さですよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por tener la misma personalidad retorcida que tú.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Because he has a personality as wicked as yours.

CONTENT: ビックリした
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He startled me.

CONTENT: どうしたんだろう エランさん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What happened to Mr. Elan?

CONTENT: なんか怖かった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He was kind of frightening.

CONTENT: ダメー! ん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can't!

CONTENT: ダメです 出ていってください!　おわっ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can't be here! Please leave!

CONTENT: おわっ　勝手に温室入ったらダメです!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can't trespass in the greenhouse!

CONTENT: この子たちのお世話 私が頼まれたんです!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm the one who was asked to take care of them all!

CONTENT: いや 私たちは...　ミオリネさんに直接言われて... あんたしかいないって だから...　いや 私たちは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nosotros no... -Lo dijo Miorine. Que tenía que ser yo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hold it, we were- Ms. Miorine told me herself! She had no one else to ask! That's why-

CONTENT: スレッタ? あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta? Huh?

CONTENT: ミオリネさん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Miorine?

CONTENT: 何やってんのよ あんた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What the heck are you doing?

CONTENT: 帰ってたんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You've already gotten back?

CONTENT: 船を買ったの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I bought a spaceship.

CONTENT: 定期便を使わなくていいから 早く着いたわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al no usar el transporte regular, llegué antes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Since I didn't have to take a public flight, I got home sooner.

CONTENT: では 見積りどおり こちらの金額で
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: As per our estimate, it's going to cost this much.

CONTENT: 請求書は会社のほうに回しといて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Envía la factura a la empresa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Send the invoice to the company.

CONTENT: ミオリネさん あの人たち...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Miorine, those men...

CONTENT: ファームの業者に この子たちの世話を頼んだの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Le pedí a una granja que se encargara de ellas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I hired some farm workers to take care of my plants.

CONTENT: 出張 これから もっと増えそうだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm only going to have more business trips.

CONTENT: あんたも仕事減って うれしいでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es mejor, ¿no? Menos trabajo para ti.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's one less chore for you, right?

CONTENT: ミオリネさんの大切...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I thought this was important to you...

CONTENT: 私 任されたって...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y las dejaste a mi cargo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and you were relying on me...

CONTENT: ありがとね　お疲れさま あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks for that. You did a good job.

CONTENT: そういえば エランには会った?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: By the way, did you run into Elan?

CONTENT: え? だ... 大丈夫です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? D-Don't worry!

CONTENT: 私には ミオリネさんが...　なんのこと?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te tengo a ti. -¿De qué hablas?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're my only- What are you talking about?

CONTENT: エランさんに デートしようって言われて...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mr. Elan asked me on a date.

CONTENT: でも ちゃんと断ったんです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero le dije que no podía ser.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I made sure to say no!

CONTENT: いいよ デートして
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's fine. Go on a date.

CONTENT: え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: 同僚になるんだから仲良くやってよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Háganse amigos. Será tu colega de trabajo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He's going to be your colleague, so try to get along.

CONTENT: あっ 決闘はダメだからね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, and no more duels with him.

CONTENT: 同僚って?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My colleague?

CONTENT: ガンダムパイロットの 経験を買って雇うことにしたの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo contrataré por su experiencia como piloto de Gundam.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Since he has experience as a Gundam pilot, I decided to hire him.

CONTENT: テスターが 1人だけの会社なんてヤバいでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Una empresa no puede tener un solo tester.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's nuts for the company to have only one tester, right?

CONTENT: これでスレッタに なんでも頼まなくてよくなるわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Así no tendré que pedírtelo todo a ti.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now I won't have to ask you for everything.

CONTENT: 私 いなくても いいってことですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't need to be here?

CONTENT: そうね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess not.

CONTENT: ですよね そうでした
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right... That makes sense.

CONTENT: 私 1人で勘違いして...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me había hecho ilusiones yo sola.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've been getting wrong ideas all on my own.

CONTENT: そうそう　エアリアルだけど⸺　プラント・クエタまで 取りに行くことになったから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por cierto, tengo que ir a buscar el Aerial a la planta Quetta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's right... about Aerial. I'm going to pick her up at Plant Quetta.

CONTENT: あんたも来てよ　楽しみでしょ? 久しぶりに エアリアルに会えるの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ven tú también. Tendrás ganas de verlo de nuevo, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You should come too. I bet you're excited. You're going to see Aerial again.

CONTENT: お待ちしていました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've been waiting for you,

CONTENT: デリング・レンブラン
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Delling Rembran.

CONTENT: 食事です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Here's your food!

CONTENT: 遅いぞ ボブ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You kept us waiting, Bob!

CONTENT: すいません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sorry.

CONTENT: お前は 食ったのか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What about you? Have you eaten?

CONTENT: え? いや まだ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No... not yet.

CONTENT: 着く前に食っとけよ? 体に響くぞ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Come antes de llegar o te afectará.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do it before we arrive! Your body will need it.

CONTENT: ありがとうございます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you very much.

CONTENT: 航行監視システムにオブジェクト
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Objects detected by navigation surveillance!

CONTENT: パーメット識別コード確認
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Confirming Permet ID codes.

CONTENT: モビルスーツです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They're mobile suits!

CONTENT: プラント・クエタか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: From Plant Quetta?

CONTENT: 相互通信チャンネルに応答なし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No response on intercommunication channels.

CONTENT: 本船に接近してきます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They're heading straight for us.

CONTENT: 警告を発しろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sound the alarm.

CONTENT: あれは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's...

CONTENT: そろそろ彼らが接触する時間だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They should be making contact about now...

CONTENT: そうだな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess.

CONTENT: 反応うっす
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You sound indifferent.

CONTENT: いいの? こんなタイミングで波風起こして
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿De verdad es buena idea armar escándalo ahora?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you sure this is the right time to be making waves?

CONTENT: 元々 我々は 決闘ゲームに重きを置いていない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nosotros nunca valoramos el juego de los duelos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We've never given much priority to the dueling game, anyway.

CONTENT: シャディクは ずっと前からやるつもりだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Shaddiq pretendía hacerlo desde hacía tiempo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shaddiq always intended to do this.

CONTENT: そうでしょ?　ああ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Isn't that right? Yes.

CONTENT: ベネリットグループを解体する
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're going to break up the Benerit Group.

CONTENT: 俺は もう ためらわない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I won't hesitate... any longer.

CONTENT: これより この船は⸺　我ら\"フォルドの夜明け\"の 管轄下に入る
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esta nave queda bajo el control de Alba de Fold.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This ship is now under the control of the Dawn of Fold.

CONTENT: 諸君らには... は...　速やかに 応じてくれることを要求する
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We demand that all of you cooperate immediately.

CONTENT: 抵抗してもいいけど 殺すから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Or feel free to resist... if you want to die.

CONTENT: 次回　「機動戦士ガンダム 水星の魔女」
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Next time on Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury,
